page.title: 07 COMPUTER MAINTENANCE
page.content: There is a computer repair company in the village of{Ramsden Heath}which has five branches throughout the country. The local factory carries out between{fifty}and{sixty}repairs each day. Up to seventy five workers are employed,mostly carrying out repairs at the factory. They have vans and company cars for delivering,a few repairs being done on the spot. In addition they make computer software packages. The engineers occupy two buildings and everyone is frantically busy each morning. After lunch work is usually well enough in hand for the pace to slacken a little. By this means they are able to prevent a backlog of work from building up,an essential requirement for an efficient repair business. The men enjoy their work immensely.
